title: Too many ads
text:
There’s an ad before each level, after and in between 
Ridiculous

title: Ehh
text: The ads that you have to watch between each level are longer than the actual game play.  Got old fast and deleted

title: I Love The Game Buuuuutttt ...
text: I Love This Game But Those Ads Blow The Moment. FIX THAT ASAP !!!!

title: Ads During Gameplay
text: It’s bad enough that you have to sit through ads between levels but during each level the game pauses to show 15-30 second ads. This happens every single level about 2 or 3 times. This would have been a 5 star game for me but the frequency of the ads is just unbearable.

title: 5 to 2 stars
text: Great game but the new update ruined the game play with more Ads. Control also suffered in the update

title: Ads even after I paid to remove them!
text:
This game is so fun and addicting but I paid $2.99 to remove the ads and I’m still getting ads!! Would be a five star review if not for that.
Fix the ads!!!

title: Fun But Too Many Ads
text: Fun game but Ads are ridiculous!

title: Good game; but boring after 5 minutes
text:
The game is well made and from the first 50 or so levels; bug free.It’s just the same thing over and over. Like driving through a tunnel with no end in sight.
I would recommend adding in things like power-up and upgrades achieved by the coins. Not just skins.

title: Too many adds
text: It was a good game and a lot of fun. There was just way too many adds. Adds after each round and then they started popping up in the middle of the game. And when it did it always messed you up if it didn’t kill you by making you run off the edge. It totally ruined the game. I had to delete it. It became unplayable.

title: Ads in the middle of a level
text: So I loved playing this game (4  star worthy) and got up to lvl 100 pretty quickly. Now they added ads in the middle of a level (at the checkpoint) instead of after you finish the level (2 star review). This means that as you’re walking (finger on the screen) and playing the game all of a sudden an ad starts. Then after the ad (finger off the screen) you have to remember which way you were going and get your finger back on the screen. I’ll try again in a week and if the ads are still like this I will uninstall.

title: Adds
text: Too many adds. Not worth it

title: Poor
text: The games made by them stay glitching

title: Wow. Ads
text: Ads are too long and far too frequent. Nope

title: Burla
text: La burla es como este juego pareces que vas perdiendo pero al final san que el que ríe es quien goza. Amon - Ra

title: This is the easiest game ever,and ruin my life.
text: Hi there,this is the easiest game I have played,and ever since I started playing this game my friend has been hugging me.Did the game do something to me?

title: Not good
text: Excessive advertising

title: More levels
text: I am on level 1,286 so just wanted to let folks know it DOES get progressively harder, its just veeeeeery gradual. Would like to see more options to spend the coins on besides just different characters. For everyone disliking the ads you can just pay $2.99 like I did and get rid of them entirely. For a free app it isn’t too bad having to spend three bucks on something like that.

title: Ads in mid game!!!
text: Not worth playing ads in the middle of a match. Do not download

title: Great game, but... ads
text:
I did not mind the short ads after each level. But with the latest release ads are pushed during the level as well. There is a point that it is to much and it ruins the game. You have reached that point now. I recommend removing the ads while playing the level as it becomes no longer fun to play.
I do like the new enemies that are shooting at you. :-)

title: WAY TO MANY ADS
text: It was fun at first but now an ad pops up every minute or two.

title: Awesome
text: Great game

title: Ads
text: I love this game. It’s one of my favorite apps and I play it multiple times everyday. The ONLY problem I have with it now, is the ads popping up right in the middle of a level. When the ad is over your character is moving and it takes forever to regain control of it, and if you have the golden pusher thing, you are most likely to lose it after the ad because you will have to tap the screen multiple times to regain control. Other than that it’s a great game. I hope the ads get fixed to were they are now only at the end of each/every other completed level.

title: Too many adds
text: Fun games just to many adds 😒

title: It’s ok
text: Too many commercials

title: Too many ads
text: I would like to finish an entire level before getting ads. I would even get double ads during a game.

title: You spend more time watching ads than you do playing.
text: My first 15 seconds of play time and it’s followed by 45 seconds of ads.

title: Too much
text: I use to really like this game but in the last week they added more ads. I know all games have them now but these ads stop you in the middle of the game. 2-3 ads per level, this has completely ruined this game

title: Too many ads
text: Too many ads

title: Ads while playing is dumb.
text:
It was great until they put ads in while playing.  I can deal with the ads once you complete a level, but in the middle of a “game” is crappy. Besides it being annoying, it’s very difficult to control the guy when you get back to playing. 

Game is a 5 star otherwise. I’m playing much less now. Smh

title: Lol
text: That's what she said 😏

title: Addictive!
text: Can’t say anymore than that.

title: Why ads?
text: This is a great game but the amount of ads that pop up just make the game not worth it. Would be great without the ads. Game is actually really great and I would pay for this game just to bypass ads!

title: This game is so wicked
text: I feel like a mass murdering psychopath when I play this but I can’t stop.

title: Ehhhhh....
text: I loved this game since I started playing this but there is way way way too much adds!!!!! And I feel like the levels are a bit to short kinda..

title: Fun but too many adds
text: It’s a lot of fun but after one of the updates there are tons of adds after each phase and not just the end of the level and some don’t ever give u the option to close and u have to restart. I hope this is a bug that will get fixed with an update, if not I’ll probably quit playing. Otherwise I would give this 5 stars.

title: Awesome
text: This game is awesome because it get your angry out.Which I have a lot of.

title: Just please be aware of some things...
text: I’m very addicted to this game! Overall, it’s a great game, but at some point, about 2-3 ads pop up in the middle of a game/level, which is so frustrating!! And most of these ads are ads for Voodoo’s own games. It would be better if there were less ads, happening when you finish a level.

title: So fun👍👍👍😀

title: Great game:)
text: I don’t know why people think that this game is not fun it has been fun and it has been great for me when you are playing it feels like you are doing it you can have fun and it has great graphics when you get a chance to get it take it thanks😀😀😀

title: Ads
text: There is an ad every minute. I barely use it anymore.

title: Fun BUT ad heavy
text: Fun game. I enjoy It but every level. Sometimes during a level. Every time you fall or anything there’sanother ad    Ad after ad. Deleted.

title: Good game
text: I personally liked this game because when I play it,  it is always so satisfying and fun to play.  I also like   How there are not a lot of ads because if there were,  it would be very annoying😖I totally recommend this game for anybody who has a strong opinion on games and does not have a lot of time on their hands.⏰.        Sincerely,Radrainbow 27.    PS.check me out on TikTok

title: Too many ads
text: Great idea but ads pop up right in the middle of play. Not worth the hassle.

title: Ads
text: Fun game, but ads every 60 seconds make this game unplayable.

title: Ads in middle of level
text: I was playing this game non stop and was so excited for an update and to have new enemies to kill. But the ads in the middle of the level, sometimes multiple ads, completely ruin it. Please fix and put them in between levels again.

title: Devley snipes
text: Great game but literally an add every chance you get .. can’t lie that’s really annoying. I know it’s a free game but there are many that don’t have so many advertisements. Overall it destroys the experience. I probably won’t play for much longer

title: Ads crash app
text: I will change this from one star when the developers fix the ads so that they don’t crash the game.  I get ads to pay for a free game, but if you do your job right, the ads won’t crash the app.

title: Ads
text: Fun game but way to many ads. Extremely irritating and annoying when ads pop up every minute.

title: Review
text: This is an awesome game!!!!!

title: Ads pop up mid game
text: I don’t mind ads at the end of a round but mid game takes me out out of focus. Will delete soon.
